segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how absurd this whole scene is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, and the water is just gushing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies like little thieves, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading across the floor, and she’s still just polishing that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice or if she’ll just keep going until the whole kitchen is flooded.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s plate is probably going to be full of cookies before he even falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t wait to see how this all plays out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments that’s funny now but will probably end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR
